clues.text: We hope the ivory-billed species of this U.S. & Cuban bird makes a comeback, knock on...

"Listen, my children, and you shall hear of" this

This "Don Juan" poet adopted a third given name, Noel, to receive an inheritance from his mother-in-law

clues.text: You'll find the John F. Kennedy School of Government at this Ivy League university, JFK's alma mater

rounds.text: His 1922 New York Times obituary mentions that his patent No. 174,465 "has been called the most valuable patent ever issued"
